links: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: lst={};Do[s=n^3;If[PrimeQ[p=s-2], AppendTo[lst, p]], {n, 6!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 26 2008 *)Select[Range[300]^3-2,PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 18 2015 *)
